item.description:
Cape Cod Raw Food Meetup Community presents......

Connecting with Your Angels - An evening of having Connecting with Your Angels

Special Guest Speaker: Beth "B" Carleton from Virginia

You are invited to share in a powerful evening with the angels!!!

Participate in a night of “being” and “playing” in the brilliant flow of angel energy. You   will see why nothing is fully preplanned when a evening with the angels is scheduled, as trusting their Divine guidance brings a wonderful element of surprise and joy! All we need do is gather together with loving hearts and open minds and enjoy how the angels orchestrate our time together.

The angels are looking forward to:

Whispering their messages to you,

Dancing with you to the melodies of your soul,

Showing you their unconditional love,

Listening to your needs as you ASK,

Bringing you: peace of mind, solutions and the gift of connecting with each other.

…….See you there. It will truly be an honor to meet you all.

Light-filled blessings,

“B”

05:30PM: Sign-in & get settled
05:40PM: Potluck*
06:15PM: Announcements
06:30PM: Guest Speaker: Beth "B" Carleton  - Connecting with your Angels

*Bring a raw/live, plant-based, organic dish to enjoy. Experience the delicious variety of live raw foods. http://www.meetup.com/RawBoston/pages/Potlucks

Beth “B” Carleton is an Ordained Angel Minister, ANGEL THERAPY PRACTITIONER®, Certified Angel Messenger, Reiki Master and owner of “Angels Whispering Light” and Exquisite Creations. She delivers angel messages for clients all over the world in person, by telephone and via Skype and is simply known as “B”. Serving as the conduit, “B” assists you in connecting with your angels so you may receive their whispers of loving guidance and tap into your ever-present intrinsic light. “B” also performs non-denominational weddings and baptisms and is planning to develop a “spiritual nourishment” center in the near future. She conducts angel communication certification classes and is completing a workbook guide to self-nourishment and self-love called “The Thirty Day Dance With The Angels”. She was a guest speaker in California at Michael Beckwith’s Church of Agape’s seminar called “Get Up From Your Bed and Walk” sharing her personal experience of a miraculous healing. She is preparing for an angel message tour in Denmark and Ireland. Her words of love are: “As I was assisted, so I wish to assist those who cross my path in igniting the light already within them to a blazing brilliance by connecting them with their angels and assuring them they are never, ever alone.” “B” offers full hour angel message sessions for $44.00. Feel free to contact her to schedule a session at 508-944-4181 or e-mail her at Angelswhisperinglight (at) yahoo (dot) com.

WELCOME: Are you interested in fun and simply, a healthier way of eating? Are you suffering from a health condition that may be food or lifestyle related? (85% of chronic diseases are)! The purpose of the Meetup: Cape Cod Raw is to gather and support people who want to transition into a healthier way of eating.

Wherever you are in this process, there are great ways to transition. Even if you are just attempting this for the first time, you will gain valuable information and support on food choices, on an acid/alkaline balance lifestyle, and on enjoying an abundant life that for many are our heart's desire. This Meetup group shares information related to raw food and holistic lifestyle.  We gather for demos, lectures and other related events that encourage a vegan and raw lifestyle.

Do some of us eat cooked food? Yes, of course we do. However, for optimal cellular health, we love eating raw, live food. We welcome the newbie, the curious and the seasoned raw foodist.

Questions: Call Dorothy Torrey, www.PathToVibrantHealth.com 508-888-6677

Visit: http://www.meetup.com/Cape-Cod-Raw-Food-Meetup/
item.name: Potluck and lecture: Beth Carleton - Raw foods could enhance your spirituality
